thread.section_title: San Francisco Airport Marriott Waterfront - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Burlingame, CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: My go to hotel at SFO
thread.title_full: My go to hotel at SFO - Review of San Francisco Airport Marriott Waterfront, Burlingame, CA - TripAdvisor

author: Andrew D
title: My go to hotel at SFO
text: After a long flight, if you need to sleep, this is the place. It's clean, friendly, and close to the airport. Has a shuttle. The beds are deliciously comfortable, especially after a trans-Pacific flight. If you have a crazy-long layover and just need to sleep (say between China and us east coast) - ask the airline for a courtesy voucher which will allow you to stay at the Marriott (and some others I think) for about half price. They have certain rooms set aside for this. Usually reasonably priced. Try to book in advance.
